scripts.wp:clean: cd wordpress-local && docker-compose down -v && docker system prune -f
scripts.wp:backup: cd wordpress-local && docker-compose exec db mysqladump -u wordpress -pwordpress wordpress > backup.sql
scripts.wp:restore: cd wordpress-local && docker-compose exec -T db mysql -u wordpress -pwordpress wordpress < backup.sql
scripts.wp:cli: cd wordpress-local && docker-compose --profile cli run --rm wp-cli wp
scripts.wp:plugin:list: cd wordpress-local && docker-compose --profile cli run --rm wp-cli wp plugin list
scripts.wp:plugin:install: cd wordpress-local && docker-compose --profile cli run --rm wp-cli wp plugin install
scripts.wp:plugin:activate: cd wordpress-local && docker-compose --profile cli run --rm wp-cli wp plugin activate
scripts.wp:plugin:deactivate: cd wordpress-local && docker-compose --profile cli run --rm wp-cli wp plugin deactivate
scripts.wp:posts: cd wordpress-local && docker-compose --profile cli run --rm wp-cli wp post list
scripts.wp:pages: cd wordpress-local && docker-compose --profile cli run --rm wp-cli wp post list --post_type=page
